title: Rewrite the Expression

title: Simplify the Expression
text: According to the above steps, we can rewrite $$\frac{4}{m+3}+\frac{3}{m+4}$$ as $$\frac{7m+25}{\left(m+3\right) \left(m+4\right)}$$, are there any ways to simplify the new expression?

title: Simplify the Expression
text: The answer of $$\frac{7m+25}{\left(m+3\right) \left(m+4\right)}$$ is simplified because $$7m+25$$ cannot be factored.
